title: Top Floor Studio Apartment With Look&Lease Special!
posting_body: Upscale Living in the New Northgate
Welcome to Prism – a new upscale apartment experience in the heart of Seattle’s Northgate neighborhood.
Prism is built for those looking to make connections with interesting people and the exciting places around them.
Here you will enjoy brand new, light-filled apartment living with a boutique feel and rare live/work options.
You will connect with a diverse and vibrant community including thriving students, busy professionals, ambitious entrepreneurs, and conscious urbanites.
For those looking for truly connected urban living, this is the most brilliant choice.
Find your new home at Prism and experience the new Northgate.
This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 474 - 536 Sq.
Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.
If currently occupied, the individual unit you've selected may not be available to tour.
Please contact our leasing team with any questions.
